font_not_detected:
Note: No custom font files detected. It is recommended to find the following ttf font files in game resource files and place them in the parent directory:
      - zh-cn.ttf (Simplified Chinese)
      - zh-tw.ttf (Traditional Chinese)
      - ja-jp.ttf (Japanese, enables Japanese text recognition when installed)
      Loading the corresponding font file can effectively improve OCR recognition accuracy, especially avoiding the problem of dashes (——) being misrecognized as (一一).
